website_summaries.verdict: This canister vac is worth considering for buyers who prefer a model that isn't overly noisy to use. However, many of its features aren't very user-friendly.
pros: Distances itself from many canister vacuums for being fairly quiet when running
Has a HEPA filtration system that traps allergens
Swivel steering allows you to maneuver it easily around furniture and walls
cons: Subpar attachment tools are difficult to use
Power switch is in an awkward location, and power cord needs to be a bit longer

customer_reviews.title: I was really surprised to see good reviews for this product
customer_reviews.text: I was really surprised to see good reviews for this product. First off, I found the machine to be really heavy and hard to maneuver. There's no handle on the top so it's kind of awkward to pick up. I got it mainly for hardwood floors. When I used the floor attachment, all the hair (mine and pets) got stuck in the bristles and had to be untangled and manually fed into the suction tube. I then tried the carpet attachment - it too was heavy, not easy to attach and the hose is so stiff it was really difficult to use.
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: Did not work out of box
customer_reviews.text: The vacuum brush head did not work out of the box called customer support and to no respect they don't care the lady told me they are no longer making part's for this unit and could not send out a replacement so thanks' and sent back to amazon amazon is so GREAT to deal with this junk . I then ordered a Kenmore so we will see.
customer_reviews.author: David e Mutschler

customer_reviews.title: It still works great but use it to clean cars
customer_reviews.text: I have a 1995 hoover Futura.It still works great but use it to clean cars.I like this new one has plenty of suction.My 20 year old carpet stands up nice and fluffy.It is quiet also.Only draw back no where to store the tools.Great vacuum for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Carole W.

customer_reviews.title: Good machine, good price.
customer_reviews.text: I like the Hoover brand. Canister vacuums are so much easier to change heads. This machine lacks a holster for the attachments though. My old Hoover attachments stored on the top of the canister.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Dvorak

customer_reviews.title: Great Vacuum on hardwoods and does a good job on ...
customer_reviews.text: Great Vacuum on hardwoods and does a good job on carpet as well. Purchased a opened box unit and no problems. All the items were there as promised. Just wish the unit had a storage area on it for the attachments.
customer_reviews.author: Tom P

customer_reviews.title: since we had an earlier model we were satisfied with. The attachments are not as well made ...
customer_reviews.text: Not as much power as I expected,since we had an earlier model we were satisfied with. The attachments are not as well made either.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. Great suction getting those carpets
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Great suction getting those carpets vacummed
customer_reviews.author: qiskat2

customer_reviews.title: Hoover vacume
customer_reviews.text: We love it - light weight - strong suction etc Highly recommend this item and seller.
customer_reviews.author: Archie

customer_reviews.title: Spend More
customer_reviews.text: The hose isn't flexible and the on/off switch and button to retract cord are on the body of the vacuum in black so you can't discern which to push. You get what you pay for . . .
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Gianfrancesco

customer_reviews.title: Somewhat Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: From day one, the wheels on this started squeaking. I don't know if WD40 or an oil would help. I don't know why I bought a canister when I usually buy uprights. The cord seems especially short, and although it is quiet, it isn't very easy to pull around the house. It does pick up everything on the carpet very well and the attachment for the tile is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Patti M.

customer_reviews.title: Great Suction
customer_reviews.text: It has great suction and is extremely easy to use. I am not used to the canister vacuum style so it is a little cumbersome but have great versatility. The fact that the hose detaches from the wand allows me to clean places I wouldn't otherwise reach.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron Collier

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: It is hard to find an inexpensive vacuum that has a true power head for carpet. This one does and works great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product line
customer_reviews.text: I,ve always been a loyal hoover customer. I,m replacing my old hoover vac because i just can,t find parts anymore. It was mire than 25 years old. Quality speaks for itself..
customer_reviews.author: mary vanwert

customer_reviews.title: Suction is very strong .. beware of vacuuming light-weight rugs .. will lift them up off floor
customer_reviews.text: Liked everything about the vacuum .. BUT ... no headlights (Hoover is known for headlights) and no place to park hard wood floor tool on wand
customer_reviews.author: Joan F Cavanagh

customer_reviews.title: Great Vacuum  Cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Very please from ordering to packaging, received in excellent shape, works like it's supposed to, super deal.
customer_reviews.author: Edward R. Storti

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Assembled vac carefully. Double checked polarity of electrical plug. Still got a mild electric shock along metal wand. Returned same day. Amazon credited immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Anita

customer_reviews.title: If I could give a zero rating I would.
customer_reviews.text: Terrible vacuum. Did not even have enough suction power to pick up a dog hair off the floor. Returned as defective.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not quiet.
customer_reviews.text: It is compact but it is not quiet. Should not be named Quiet Performance.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: keep it together
customer_reviews.text: For this price I expect little hassle. However, the head keeps coming off, and I don't mean the detachable area. I mean the area that conceals the wiring. In fact, only the wiring is holding the head to the shaft at this point. Hopefully, will be covered under warranty. Only used it a few times so far.
customer_reviews.author: Home Owner

customer_reviews.title: I have always loved Hoover vacuum cleaners
customer_reviews.text: I have always loved Hoover vacuum cleaners. Unfortunately this one does not live up to previous Hoover standards. This vacuum does not come apart easily to use the attachments. The problem is the concealed power cord plug. It is not easy to disconnect. It is like using an upright. If you want a canister buy another brand. This vacuum is easy to vacuum carpet but not to change to different attachments which is why someone buys a canister vacuum. I do not recommend this product. I also do not think the vacuum head has enough power compared to previous models.
customer_reviews.author: J Cole

customer_reviews.title: Not worth even half as much money
customer_reviews.text: Weak, not a lot of suction, poor extension ability. I would not recommend this unless you live in a climate where there is little dust. It doesn't work well on carpet AND it doesn't work well on hardwood floors. I wish I had returned it right after I bought it, but I didn't. I'll use it for a couple of years then trash it and buy something useful.
customer_reviews.author: budababy

customer_reviews.title: easy to use cleaning is good surprised how much the ...
customer_reviews.text: easy to use cleaning is good surprised how much the little bag holds
customer_reviews.author: sylvia j pollock

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like that the Hoover canister isn't heavy and it is very easy to get around.
customer_reviews.author: Lyla Saam

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this product it is really poor quality. Has no suck! I have used many Hoovers and this one is not good. time to move to another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: It really is Quiet
customer_reviews.text: The best canister but needs better above floor tools for dusting etc....
customer_reviews.author: MajMarty

customer_reviews.title: So far I like it. It isn't real heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: So far I like it. It isn't real heavy duty, but great for bare floors, and light carpets.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not near as well-built as I hoped for the price. Bought in Dec2014. The hose just tore apart.
customer_reviews.author: M. Billman

customer_reviews.title: Excellent vacuum and quiet Hard wood floor attacment good for ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent vacuum and quiet Hard wood floor attacment good for low pile rugs
customer_reviews.author: keith olmsted

customer_reviews.title: but I really like the swivel part
customer_reviews.text: It was quiet to start with, but after a few months of use, it isn't as quiet. It is got so much plastic that I don't think it will last long, since plastic tends to break and isn't fixable. The power head is small, but I really like the swivel part. The floor head doesn't pick up bigger chunks of dirt and mud very well. It isn't as good as my old hoover. It has now been 2 years, and the hose at the handle has split. I would not buy this machine again. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: shortstop

customer_reviews.title: Good vacuum for a good price.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my grandparents & so far they really love it. They’ve used Hoover vacuums for many years, so they’re rather bias to the brand. But nonetheless, they seem grateful to track down such a decent vacuum for a good price without having to leave the house. It’s relatively quiet, also. And my Nana finds it easy to pull & swivel (she’s 83 & uses it just fine. For the record, I’d do it for her, but she has to clean her house herself for some reason. I don’t think anyone does it as well as she does;)
customer_reviews.author: DaniDawnW

customer_reviews.title: Poor suction
customer_reviews.text: I ran a regular vacuum cleaner probably the cheapest one on the Wal-Mart shelf over the areas I just swept with this one and got up all of this dirt. This suggested to me that the suction is very poor. This is with the suction turned all the way up. I would pass this one up, and while the vacuum cleaner isn't that loud in itself when you turn the brush roller on it get pretty loud. The only thing I liked about this vacuum cleaner is it has a sound that you can sleep to. The sound is very harmonic and someone could possibly mix it in a soundtrack and make a music sample out of it.
customer_reviews.author: ZCONCET100

customer_reviews.title: Not very light. Not very quiet
customer_reviews.text: The Hoover is billed in advertising as a vacuum that's light, quiet, and powerful. The power is fine for our needs (no high pile rugs, little carpeting), but it's loud and heavy. Worse, the design is awkward, so it's hard to maneuver; and it has bits that stick our here and there, just perfect to bump and snag your ankles and fingers. Because of this we're very disappointed, and will probably replace the thing as soon as we find something better.
customer_reviews.author: John M

customer_reviews.title: A lovely vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I really like the long cord!!! Canister vacuums are my favorite in general to uprights. I guess you can switch from carpet to hardwood with the big attachment but l am just as happy taking it off and using the attachment just for hardwood floors.
customer_reviews.author: katzen

customer_reviews.title: The vacuum I recieved is NO Quiet.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased an open box of this vacuum. I found the attachment was broken in 3 pieces. I wouldn't have used it anyway. The vacuum's suction is great, canister is heavy and hard to pick up. I'm glad I got it for a lower price, as I would have sent it back if I had paid full price.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Robinette

customer_reviews.title: Good vacuum cleaner, cheap useless attachement.
customer_reviews.text: Believe it or not, we used the Hoover to vacuum the carpets and upholstery. Haven't figured out yet what else we could do with it.....poach eggs? Everything works fine but the dual purpose Crevice/Fabric tool is a joke, what a worthless piece of junk!
customer_reviews.author: Phil M. Wright

customer_reviews.title: Great vacuum
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS VAC! It works very well, has a lot of options . . . Beware . . .it is HEAVY
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hope it stands up :)
customer_reviews.text: Quiet and light - hope it stands up to the Hoover name. I was hesitant with a few of the reviews but I needed asap.
customer_reviews.author: South Texas

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! I have 3 dogs and this is the perfect product for cleaning up.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Brink

customer_reviews.title: Convenient but not meant for Pet Owners
customer_reviews.text: Great Canister Vacuum BUT not meant for pet owners. Having a canister is very handy because its got the extra tools to clean around the house BUT if you have pets like I do...its not a good idea to have this. The bag itself gets very full fast especially from dog hair. I would recommend get an Oreck upright (in my opinion its suction is stronger) and because it holds more than a canister. Yes, its inconvenient for an upright but it will cost more money to buy extra canister bags and replacing it it all the time.
customer_reviews.author: J. Grimm

customer_reviews.title: Great except for the attachments attachment!
customer_reviews.text: Great vacuum cleaner but the way the additional cleaning attachments attach could be much better. They seem to have forgotten the attachments were going to be included until they were ready to start shipping units and had to improvise a solution at the last minute. These are supposed to attach to a small clip directly under the handle but they spend 99% of the time on the ground getting run over by the canister instead. If you don't mind the look, duct taping them into place is a simple solution to keep them with the vacuum cleaner...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cannot recommend this item
customer_reviews.text: We returned this after using it for a while when it basically started to fall apart. Cannot recommend this item. Hoover used to be the standard by which other vacuums were measured. In my opinion, that is no longer the case...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: i love my new vaccum not only does it perform very ...
customer_reviews.text: i love my new vaccum not only does it perform very well ,it looks like the times we live in :modern looking nutral & slick like a star treck character.
customer_reviews.author: Malika T. Dull

customer_reviews.title: It would be fantastic except for 1) no on off button on handle
customer_reviews.text: It would be fantastic except for 1) no on off button on handle, and 2) the brush and edger are not very good... Will buy a full brush and separate edger.. The "button" that releases the wands from te carpet cleaner requires several times before it finally clicks and the cleaner can be removed.
customer_reviews.author: Mama

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work.
customer_reviews.text: Used the first two times and loved it. Went to use it the third time and after 3 minutes it stopped working. Tried all trouble shooting still doesn't work. Very disappointed. Not cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Esther Sloan

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Clip for the small vacuum head broke after one week of use. Other than that it’s been good so far.
customer_reviews.author: g

product_meta.title: Hoover Quiet Performance Bagged Canister Vacuum, SH30050 Corded
product_meta.description: The Hoover Quiet Performance Bagged Canister Vacuum delivers a quiet performance without sacrificing power. Now it’s easier to sneak up on messes with 5 speed suction control that matches motor speed and suction to your cleaning task. And the Multi-Floor Power Nozzle and Complete Accessory Pack give you a versatile clean that a traditional upright vacuum just can’t get to.
feature_bullets: Steerable Technology allows you to swivel and turn around objects with a flick of the wrist
WindTunnel 3 Technology : creates three channels of suction to lift and remove surface debris and deep down embedded dirt
5 Speed Suction Control allows you to match the motor speed and suction to your cleaning task
HEPA Media filter made with HEPA media traps 99 97 percent of dust, dirt and pollens down to 0 3 microns
Complete Accessory Pack: Crevice Tool, Dusting Brush, Hard Floor Brush, Telescoping Extension Wand

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.8 out of 5 stars113 ratings3.8 out of 5 stars
